Wheaton.Community Unit School District 200 (DuPa: Community Unit School District 200 (CUSD 200) based in Wheaton, Illinois is a public school district mainly serving the communities of Wheaton and Warrenville. CUSD 200 also services fringe areas of Carol Stream, Winfield, and West Chicago. For the 2005-06 school year, there were a total of 14,173 students enrolled in twenty schools ranging from preschool through 12th grade.
